sentences: Fernando Paggi (3 July 1914 – 14 January 1973) was a Swiss conductor and musician known for conducting the Swiss entries for three Eurovision Song Contests.
He was also the conductor of the Radio Monte Ceneri Orchestra.
Eurovision Song Contest 1956 – conducted the winning entry for host nation Switzerland, Refrain, sung by Lys Assia; also conducted the Dutch and German entries
"And the conductor is...|...a website dedicated to all conductors of the Eurovision Song Contest".
